Beyond Service - Understanding Consumer Behavior

"Beyond Service" offers an insightful exploration of consumer behaviour in the hospitality industry, focusing on how cultural diversity, technological advancements, and sustainability influence guest experiences and expectations. Students will analyse consumer behaviour and the significance of adapting to global market trends and emerging technologies. The course highlights the importance of ethical considerations and environmental stewardship in the hospitality sector, equipping students to navigate and thrive in this dynamic industry.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identify key theoretical frameworks and their application to consumer behaviour in the hospitality industry

+  Be able to develop and implement strategies for providing exceptional, personalized guest services.

+  Understand how to evaluate the role of sustainability and ethical practices in influencing consumer preferences and expectations.

+  Be able to identify and respond effectively to evolving global market trends and emerging technologies in hospitality.
